name: Voo&Doo (html)
description:
Player 1 : WASD + F // Player 2 : Arrows + 0 //Enter : Restart

or 2 xbox controllers :)

Voo&Doo is a 2 player game, in wich you take control of two dolls, respectively named Voo, and Doo. But these aren't your basic, girly dolls : these are Voodoo dolls! They were created with the special ability to control Gravity! Voo has the power to repulse everything around him (mostly girls). Doo has the opposite power of attraction, but he is always sad because everything fly up to his face. Poor Doo. Together, with their powers combined, they face every perils and defeat every foes !
